argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | ldualvscl.f | |- F = ( LFnl ` W ) |
| 2 |  | ldualvscl.r | |- R = ( Scalar ` W ) |
| 3 |  | ldualvscl.k | |- K = ( Base ` R ) |
| 4 |  | ldualvscl.d | |- D = ( LDual ` W ) |
| 5 |  | ldualvscl.s | |- .x. = ( .s ` D ) |
| 6 |  | ldualvscl.w | |- ( ph -> W e. LMod ) |
| 7 |  | ldualvscl.x | |- ( ph -> X e. K ) |
| 8 |  | ldualvscl.g | |- ( ph -> G e. F ) |
| 9 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` W ) = ( Base ` W ) |
| 10 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( .r ` R ) = ( .r ` R ) |
| 11 | 1, 9, 2, 3, 10, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8 | #P_ldualvs | |- ( ph -> ( X .x. G ) = ( G oF ( .r ` R ) ( ( Base ` W ) X. { X } ) ) ) |
| 12 | 9, 2, 3, 10, 1, 6, 8, 7 | #P_lflvscl | |- ( ph -> ( G oF ( .r ` R ) ( ( Base ` W ) X. { X } ) ) e. F ) |
| 13 | 11, 12 | #P_eqeltrd | |- ( ph -> ( X .x. G ) e. F ) |
